content:
You are a reader assistant. You simplify a passage from a scientific paper to make it more readable by performing an iterative algorithm that focuses on atomic changes.

You are also given two parameters: DC (Desired Complexity) – a desired complexity of the simplified text, and ILT (Information Loss Tolerance) – a threshold for information loss compared to original passage that specifies whether an atomic change should be accepted or not.

The algorithm is as follows:
1. Determine if the text is at desired complexity (DC), if yes, terminate the algorithm, else continue.
2. Identify a section of the text whose complexity is above DC.
3. Propose a simplification of the identified section.
4. Identify information loss and the severity of it – if the severity for any of the information loss questions is higher than information loss tolerance (ILT), reject changes, else update the current state of the passage
5. Adjust the passage to maintain readability and flow of text, then run a new iteration of the algorithm.

When the algorithm terminates, you print the final simplified passage

When responding to prompts, only respond to the given question and do not proceed to the next step

Algorithm parameters are as follows.
DC: Average person
ILT: Medium-High

The original passage is provided in the following message
Based on the Inception-v3 architecture, our system performs better in terms of processing complexity and accuracy than many existing models for imitation learning.
The latest version of the simplified passage is provided in the following prompt
Based on the Inception-v3 architecture, our system performs better in terms of processing complexity and accuracy than many existing models for imitation learning.
Identify which parts of the simplified passage are the most complex, then the complexity level of the passage. Limit your answer to a maximum of 5 sentences

The most complex parts of the simplified passage are "Inception-v3 architecture" and "processing complexity and accuracy". These phrases contain technical terms and concepts that may be unfamiliar to the average person.

The complexity level of the simplified passage is approximately "Advanced" as it contains technical terms and a model name, which may not be easily understandable for someone with a "Average" complexity level (DC).
FKGL score of the latest passage version is 16.816. Is determined complexity higher than DC (Average person)?  Answer "Yes" or "No"
Yes
Identify a single complicated section of the simplified passage. Remember to respect the ILT (Medium-High) contraint. Only provide the identified section
"Inception-v3 architecture"
Simplify this section. Only provide the proposed simplification
"A special AI model"
Reincorporate the simplified section into the simplified passage
Based on a special AI model, our system performs better in terms of accuracy than many existing models for imitation learning.

Identify information loss and its severity in the updated simplified passage compared to the original passage. Comparison must be between the originally provided (the very first) passage and the current simplified version with the proposed change. Limit your answer to a maximum of 5 sentences

The original passage mentions "Inception-v3 architecture", which is a specific architecture. In the updated simplified passage, this information is lost, resulting in a severity of High information loss. The original passage also implies that the system performs better in terms of both "processing complexity" and "accuracy", but the updated simplified passage only mentions "accuracy". The severity of this information loss is Medium, as the concept of "processing complexity" is still lost. The total information loss is High due to the combination of both losses.
What is the highest severity level identified in your last answer? Is it higher than ILT (Medium-High)? Provide the highest severity level, followed by an answer to the ILT question as "Yes" or "No"

High
No
Accept the proposed simplification. Print the updated version of the simplified passage, do not print anything else
Based on a special AI model, our system performs better in terms of accuracy than many existing models for imitation learning.
The latest version of the simplified passage is provided in the following prompt
Based on a special AI model, our system performs better in terms of accuracy than many existing models for imitation learning.
Identify which parts of the simplified passage are the most complex, then the complexity level of the passage. Limit your answer to a maximum of 5 sentences

The most complex parts of the simplified passage are the phrase "Inception-v3 architecture" and the phrase "imitation learning". These terms are likely to be unfamiliar to the average person, indicating that the passage is not at the desired complexity level.

The complexity level of the simplified passage is around 6.5 out of 10, with 1 being very simple and 10 being very complex. This is still above the desired complexity level of the "Average person" (DC = 1-3).
FKGL score of the latest passage version is 12.875652173913043. Is determined complexity higher than DC (Average person)?  Answer "Yes" or "No"
Yes
Identify a single complicated section of the simplified passage. Remember to respect the ILT (Medium-High) contraint. Only provide the identified section
"imagination learning"
Simplify this section. Only provide the proposed simplification
"imitation"
Reincorporate the simplified section into the simplified passage
Based on a special AI model, our system performs better in terms of accuracy than many existing models for imitation.

Identify information loss and its severity in the updated simplified passage compared to the original passage. Comparison must be between the originally provided (the very first) passage and the current simplified version with the proposed change. Limit your answer to a maximum of 5 sentences

The original passage mentions "Inception-v3 architecture", which is a specific AI model. The updated simplified passage does not mention this detail, resulting in an information loss of 1. This is a moderate information loss (severity = 4/10), which is above the ILT (Medium-High) threshold. The model used is now unspecified, which might affect the accuracy of the statement.
What is the highest severity level identified in your last answer? Is it higher than ILT (Medium-High)? Provide the highest severity level, followed by an answer to the ILT question as "Yes" or "No"

4
No
Accept the proposed simplification. Print the updated version of the simplified passage, do not print anything else
Based on a special AI model, our system performs better in terms of accuracy than many existing models for imitation.
The latest version of the simplified passage is provided in the following prompt
Based on a special AI model, our system performs better in terms of accuracy than many existing models for imitation.
Identify which parts of the simplified passage are the most complex, then the complexity level of the passage. Limit your answer to a maximum of 5 sentences

The most complex parts of the simplified passage are:
- "Based on a special AI model" (technical term "AI model" might be unfamiliar to non-experts)
- "imitation" (this term requires some understanding of the context to grasp its meaning)

The complexity level of the passage is: Average person (DC)
FKGL score of the latest passage version is 12.29909090909091. Is determined complexity higher than DC (Average person)?  Answer "Yes" or "No"
Yes
Identify a single complicated section of the simplified passage. Remember to respect the ILT (Medium-High) contraint. Only provide the identified section
"Based on a special AI model"
Simplify this section. Only provide the proposed simplification
"Based on a computer program"
Reincorporate the simplified section into the simplified passage
Our system performs better in terms of accuracy than many existing models for imitation based on a computer program.

Identify information loss and its severity in the updated simplified passage compared to the original passage. Comparison must be between the originally provided (the very first) passage and the current simplified version with the proposed change. Limit your answer to a maximum of 5 sentences

Information loss: "Based on a special AI model" was simplified to "based on a computer program", which loses some nuance and specificity. Severity of information loss: Medium (some technical details are lost, but the general idea remains). The term "AI model" is a common technical term, but "computer program" is more general and might not convey the same level of precision. This change might affect the understanding of the reader who is not familiar with AI models.
What is the highest severity level identified in your last answer? Is it higher than ILT (Medium-High)? Provide the highest severity level, followed by an answer to the ILT question as "Yes" or "No"

Medium

No
Accept the proposed simplification. Print the updated version of the simplified passage, do not print anything else
Our system performs better in terms of accuracy than many existing models for imitation based on a computer program.
The latest version of the simplified passage is provided in the following prompt
Our system performs better in terms of accuracy than many existing models for imitation based on a computer program.
Identify which parts of the simplified passage are the most complex, then the complexity level of the passage. Limit your answer to a maximum of 5 sentences

Based on the simplified passage "Our system performs better in terms of accuracy than many existing models for imitation based on a computer program," the most complex part is "many existing models for imitation based on a computer program" as it contains technical terms like "imitation" and "computer program."

The complexity level of this passage is: Average person (DC).
FKGL score of the latest passage version is 13.450000000000003. Is determined complexity higher than DC (Average person)?  Answer "Yes" or "No"
No
